Ogre

This morning I met an awesome gal and now she is my ogre pal! A giant lass of seven feet built of bone and muscled meat But beneath her leathered hide she has a softness deep inside And I know that this may sound barmy, but this ogre loves origami. Her hands, the size of double beds are perfect tools for smashing heads. But once she’s through with squashing men she finds a quiet cave and then her hands will fold and fold for hours making tiny paper flowers.
